vulnerabilities.title: Outdated SSH Server Version
vulnerabilities.description: The SSH server is running an outdated version that may contain known security vulnerabilities. Consider updating to the latest stable version.

vulnerabilities.title: HTTP Security Headers Missing
vulnerabilities.description: The web server is missing important security headers such as X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, and Content-Security-Policy.

vulnerabilities.title: Directory Listing Enabled
vulnerabilities.description: Directory listing is enabled on the web server, which may expose sensitive file information to unauthorized users.

vulnerabilities.title: Default FTP Credentials
vulnerabilities.description: The FTP server appears to be using default or weak credentials. This poses a significant security risk.

vulnerabilities.title: SSL Certificate Weak Cipher Suite
vulnerabilities.description: The SSL certificate is configured to accept weak cipher suites that may be vulnerable to cryptographic attacks.
